frame.name: Praiseworthiness
frame.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Behavior</fen> of an <fen>Evaluee</fen> is described in terms of the reaction it deserves from somebody, such as praise, blame or admiration.
<ex>It was <t>honorable</t> <fex name="Evaluee">of you</fex> <fex name="Behavior">to help that person</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Evaluee
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Behavior</fen> of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged as worthy of a particular reaction. <ex>It was <t>commendable</t> <fex name="Eval">of Lisa</fex> <fex name="Beh">to give so much to charity</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Behavior
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Behavior</fen> on which the assessment of praiseworthiness is based. <ex><fex name="Beh">Your behavior</fex> is <t>commendable</t></ex> <ex>The children made a <t>commendable</t> <fex name="Beh">effort</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the judgement or reaction is deserved. <ex><fex name="Beh">Your actions</fex> were <fex name="Deg">very</fex> <t>commendable</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the judgment denoted by the target.</def-root>
